content: I am not a bird, I am a language model, a computer program designed to understand and generate human language. I don't have the ability to hear, see, or feel, let alone communicate with birds or any living things. My purpose is to assist users in generating human-like text based on the prompts given to me. I do not have consciousness, physical or biological capabilities. If you have any concern about your mental health, please seek help from a mental health professional. They will be able to help you determine the cause of your symptoms and provide you with appropriate treatment.
